57#include <openssl/x509.h>
58
59#include <openssl/asn1.h>
60#include <openssl/digest.h>
61#include <openssl/err.h>
62#include <openssl/mem.h>
63
64
65int ASN1_digest(i2d_of_void *i2d, const EVP_MD *type, char *data,
66 unsigned char *md, unsigned int *len)
67 {
68 int i, ret;
69 unsigned char *str,*p;
70
71 i=i2d(data,NULL);
72 if ((str=(unsigned char *)OPENSSL_malloc(i)) == NULL)
73 {
74 OPENSSL_PUT_ERROR(X509, ERR_R_MALLOC_FAILURE);
75 return(0);
76 }
77 p=str;
78 i2d(data,&p);
79
80 ret = EVP_Digest(str, i, md, len, type, NULL);
81 OPENSSL_free(str);
82 return ret;
83 }
84
85int ASN1_item_digest(const ASN1_ITEM *it, const EVP_MD *type, void *asn,
86 unsigned char *md, unsigned int *len)
87 {
88 int i, ret;
89 unsigned char *str = NULL;
90
91 i=ASN1_item_i2d(asn,&str, it);
92 if (!str) return(0);
93
94 ret = EVP_Digest(str, i, md, len, type, NULL);
95 OPENSSL_free(str);
96 return ret;
97 }
98
